text: Jonas Malheiro Savimbi was an Angolan political and military leader and Pan- Africanist. He founded and led the National Union for the Total Independence of Angola (UNITA). In 2002 UNITA lost the Angolan Civil War to the People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA). ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Angolan people
title: Jonas Savimbi
